title: Ontrack EasyRecovery Enterprise 11.5.0.2 64 Bit Portable
description:
Ontrack EasyRecovery software gives users a comprehensive data recovery solution at an affordable price. Protect your data, securely erase data, recover deleted files and more. Ontrack EasyRecovery software works on all drive types and performs unlimited recoveries. Depending on your data loss situation, select from one of the software categories that best meet your needs, and shop online for the version that is right for you.

The program helps you to recover your data if you lose data due to:accidental deletion,Virus attack,damage due to power failure or sudden fluctuations in the mains voltage,errors in the program,problems when creating partitions or boot Improper shutdown,damage to the structure of the file system,Format the media or application programs on it FDISK

Features (Enterprise only):The most advanced edition of Ontrack EasyRecovery
 Network recovery support for companies that need to protect multiple workstations.
 Data erase and data protection features
 Recover data from VMwareÂ® enabled systems
 The ability to permanently erase data from VMwareÂ® enabled systems
 Hardware and software RAID recovery support
 Enhanced recovery tools, including: mail recovery, hex viewer, S.M.A.R.T. scan, bad block/block usage diagnostics, imaging tools, copy disk and refresh disk.

Note:
To preserve the drive that contains deleted files, all recovered files must be saved on a different device or on a different drive letter in the same system. Do not download the software on the drive where the data recovered.

Advantages:
Easy to use, thanks to a fully automated wizard, able to accompany you in using the program Data protection through writing with API standard system to minimize the chance of disk corruption Recovers data from file system FAT12, FAT16, FAT32, NTFS, NTFS 5 Recovers data from Apple Mac OS HFS file system on external Recovers data from file system Linux Ext2/Ext3 Recovers data from emptied Recycle Bin, files deleted from the command line and Explorer from within No limit on file size and the drive, usually associated with a DOS-based programs Recovery from formatted drives Recovery of lost partitions It can recover files based on their signature (RAW data) Recovery from all types of digital media, HDD / SSD drive, flash memory, external USB media and all other types of removable media Preview of files prior to recovery Support SATA / IDE / SCSI CD / DVD recovery (ISO9660/UDF combined with ISO9660) and average Linux (Ext2 / 3)

Minimum System Requirements
Windows All
Intel 1 GHz or higher
Minimum 512 MB of RAM. A greater amount of RAM will increase the performance of Recovery
A drive or a network drive capacity equal to or greater than the volume of data to be retrieved
Mouse
SVGA Monitor



Run as Administrator
